description: The Dr. Saba Bahouth Scholarship is open to a full-time undergraduate student who is a declared Operations and Supply Chain Management major with a minimum 3.0 GPA. The student must be more than a year away from graduation (i.e., less than 75 hours completed at the time of application. Preference is given to students active in professionally related organizations. Eligibility Requirements Declared Operations and Supply Chain Management major Minimum 3.0 GPA or higher Full Time undergraduate Student must be more than a year away from graduation / Less than 75 hours completed Selection Process Preference is given to students active in professionally related organizations
